title: 81/580/EEC: Commission Decision of 6 July 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Akashi combined light-electron microscope, model LEM 2000' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 July 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "Akashi combined light-electron microscope, model LEM 2000" may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/580/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Akashi combined lightelectron microscope, model LEM 2000" which is the subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 19 December 1980 may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 July 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
